description: Mid-sized frames accommodate all kinds of faces so everyone gets a clear view of the way ahead. All styles of the Marshall Goggles include a bonus lens, letting you customize your outlook for the conditions.Happy lenses heighten contrast detail in challenging conditions, giving excellent clarity and detail.5.5-base curve ARC spherical dual-layer lens with anti-fog and anti-scratch protection.ARC lens is thicker in the middle, tapered toward the edges for optically correct, distortion-free viewing from all angles.Flexible polyurethane frame conforms to any face for a comfortable fit.Scoop ventilation system combats lens fogging by forcing air through the frame.Triple-density face foam with moisture-wicking fleece.Dual-adjustment, silicone-ribbed strap.Essential White colourway includes a spare Happy yellow with lucid green spectra lens with 53% visible light transmission.Red Rose colourway includes a spare Happy light grey green with red spectra lens with 54% visible light transmission.
name: Spy+ Marshall Goggles - Unisex
